CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- CustomLadder에서 사용 -- Ladder의 인식 판정을 크게 함

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local Entity = self.Entity Entity.TriggerComponent.BoxOffset = Entity.ClimbableComponent.BoxOffset Entity.TriggerComponent.BoxSize = Entity.ClimbableComponent.BoxSize + Vector2(0, 1)
